summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3369 for the improvement of Wilson Avenue, from Seward Park Avenue to Grattan Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41604, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
